name: Aces Solitaire
description:
Aces Solitaire is a wonderful casual Solitaire Game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain.

Tap or drag cards to arrange them in descending order with alternating colors.

Features:
● Super addictive gameplay!
●Unlimited Tools like hints and Undos
● 500+ Levels

Download this new Emoji game to enjoy the endless fun!
